text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $8.5$.
The length of the line $AC$ is $8.5$.
The length of the line $CB$ is $14.2$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $CB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $CB$, and $DB$, forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
